settings.title: AO brand website and store
settings.lead: Building a home for the AO identity, core story, and future store launches. This is the main project hub for the brand experience.
settings.logo_alt: Against the Odds circular AO logo

settings.heading: Logo explorations
settings.description: A curated set of AO logo concepts that represent the tone and energy of the brand. These visuals inform the next steps for product, packaging, and digital presence.

settings.heading: Store roadmap
settings.description: The store will open in phases. This site will expand to include product drops, brand collaborations, and story-driven releases.

settings.title: Launch focus
settings.items:
Signature apparel core line
Limited run accessories
Community-driven collaborations

settings.title: Digital experience
settings.items:
Story-driven brand pages
Behind-the-scenes content
Drop notifications and waitlists

settings.items:

Build the storefront system
Publish launch timeline
